channel.title: PA5. First time doing SPI. Bad signal?
channel.description:
Trying to use some of the patches here, which clearly work for others: http://community.axoloti.com/t/gpio-i-o-example-74hc595-shift-register-spi/131
But doesn't for me. At all. I've loaded the patch and the only connections I have to the board (aside from usb) are PA5 and GND, which are connected to my oscope. The signal looks like noise with an occasional spike; I would expect this to be a clock signal (i.e. regular square wave). Am I missing something?
This is literally the first time I've tried to do something outside the demo patches in axoloti, so I'm hoping I'm just doing something stupid.
